version_description:
- Now compatible with iOS8 and new screen sizes
- Bug fixes

- Now compatible with iOS8 and new screen sizes
- Bug fixes

- Change playback speed
- Skip forward/backwards 15 seconds
- Sleep timer
- Minor bug fixes

- Change playback speed
- Skip forward/backwards 15 seconds
- Sleep timer
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved trimming UI
- Can now share audio in other apps like Messages, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube etc.
- Can now save your recording as a video and share with other apps
- Bug fixes

- Improved trimming UI
- Can now share audio in other apps like Messages, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube etc.
- Can now save your recording as a video and share with other apps
- Bug fixes

- Transcribe recordings into text using speech recognition (In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Add notes (In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Quick 3D touch options to start recorder from home screen
- Start recorder on app launch
- Bug fixes

- Transcribe recordings into text using speech recognition (In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Add notes (In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Quick 3D touch options to start recorder from home screen
- Start recorder on app launch
- Bug fixes

- Transcribe recordings into text using speech recognition - Maximum 10 minutes (Requires iOS10 & In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Add notes (In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Quick 3D touch options to start recorder from home screen
- Start recorder on app launch
- Bug fixes

- Transcribe recordings into text using speech recognition - Maximum 10 minutes (Requires iOS10 & In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Add notes (In-App Purchase Upgrade)
- Quick 3D touch options to start recorder from home screen
- Start recorder on app launch
- Bug fixes

-CALL RECORDER (*Requires subscription*)
Record incoming and outgoing phone calls. To record a phone call you must facilitate a 3-way conference call. The third "caller" is our recording line that will save your phone call. It is not possible to record phone calls using the built-in microphone on your iPhone. No limit on how many recordings. No per minute fee. Just a monthly subscription.

- Compatible with iPhone X
- Bug fixes & Improvements

-CALL RECORDER (*Requires subscription*)
Record incoming and outgoing phone calls. To record a phone call you must facilitate a 3-way conference call. The third "caller" is our recording line that will save your phone call. It is not possible to record phone calls using the built-in microphone on your iPhone. No limit on how many recordings. No per minute fee. Just a monthly subscription.

- Compatible with iPhone X
- Bug fixes & Improvements

- iCloud Sync fix
If you activated iCloud syncing in the previous version (3.4) and cannot find your recordings please go to the "Settings" tab in Voice Recorder then "iCloud Support" and turn off iCloud Syncing. Your recordings should reappear. You can then reactivate iCloud Syncing if you would like with the latest version of Voice Recorder

Please contact us through the support link in Voice Recorder if you have any issues

- Fixed bugs with Call Recorder feature
- You can now continue and restart transcriptions
- Fixed bug with FaceID on iOS12
- Minor bug fixes & improvements

Please contact us through the support link in Voice Recorder if you have any issues
